participant_1.background:
I drink a cup of coffee and check my email before heading out the door.
I make sure my kids are taken care of before I spend time doing what I enjoy.
I'm an avid reader of sci-fi space adventures looking for new ways to learn.
I'm happy about my new sweater, but I'm also disappointed about not getting into the gifted program.
I work hard to provide for my family and enjoy spending time with my kids and dog.

participant_2.background:
I still love to listen to music that reminds me of my childhood, especially songs from the 80s.
I'm proud of my ability to adapt to change.
I live in pittsburgh and love it, although I do miss my children when I'm away on work trips.
I'm not interested in sharing details about my personal life.
My family is very close and we always have each other's backs.

content.text: Doing well! Just got back from a long trip, I'm glad to be home.
Ah, I see. Where'd you go?
I was in Pittsburgh, visiting my family.
It was great! I got to see my kids and catch up with my parents.
That sounds nice. I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to relaxing and catching up on my reading.
What do you like to read?
I love to read sci-fi and fantasy novels. I'm also a big fan of historical fiction.
Oh, cool! I like to read sci-fi too. I just finished reading a new book called "The Martian".
Oh, I've heard good things about that book! I'll have to check it out.
Yeah, it's really good. It's about a guy who gets stranded on Mars and has to figure out how to survive.
That sounds really interesting! I'll definitely check it out.
Cool! Let me know what you think.
